name: Bad Dreams (rogueagent)
description:
Fight hellish spawns of teddies, bunnies and elephants with your bare hands or throw some gold bricks their way just for the hell of it. :) A quick project put together for Leap Motion 3DJAM. Enjoy!

Requires:

  • Oculus DK2
  • Oculus Runtime 0.7.
  • Leap Motion Controller mounted on VR headset.
Installation:
  • Unzip file and launch either the 32-bit or 64-bit executable.

How to Play:

  • Punch enemies with either hands if they get too close.
  • Throw gold bricks by sliding your palms over the brick pile.
